item.title: New Shoes Today!
item.dc:creator: Victor Goff
item.content:encoded:
The 970th Build was released today. It includes new methods, new manual and many bugfixes. And the following sample code becomes working well. :-D
# sample92.rbShoes.app :width => 150, :height => 100 do  @msg = para ''  nostroke   @img = image :width => 20, :height => 20,                             :left => 30, :top => 30 do    oval :radius => 10, :fill => red  end  @img.hover{ @msg.replace 'hello' }  @img.leave{ @msg.replace '' }   @o = oval :left => 60, :top => 60,            :radius => 10, :fill => blue  @o.hover{ @msg.replace 'hi' }  @o.leave{ @msg.replace '' }end


# With Shoes-0.r925, the blue didn't work.

Cool! B-)
ashbb
